general.description: This station lies on the main border between the Human and Rith Spheres, between the Planetarist Alliance and Irilia Clan. Built as a joint military outpost during the last phases of the war, it thrived in peace on the trade between the two winning States. However, with the development of the Three-Jumps-Route, it is slowly becoming obsolescent and is more and more used as a backdoor to its border States.
general.bar: Mostly human patrons, either hailing from the Alliance or Independent Spacers, drinking mild intoxicants with Irilia merchants
